  • In English, the gods have left their names in our days of the week. You can find Tyr the one-handed (Odin’s son), Odin, Thor, and Frigg, the queen of the gods, in, respectively, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, and Friday. (Location 46)
    • Tags:
    • Note: Interesting, find resources to back or validate this
  • Freya’s tears, for example, was a poetic way of saying “gold.” (Location 57)
